parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS solenoid can cause the vehicle to lose partial braking ability, pull to one side, and veer off course, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: vehicle pulls to one side (left or right) during brake application
vehicle veers off course during sudden stopping conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Acceleration due to Idle Control Valve Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unpredictable acceleration of the vehicle can lead to accidents, loss of control, and potentially cause harm to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: The engine suddenly accelerates as the RPMs drop
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly while in park or neutral
the vehicle fails to cut off when slowing down or coming to a stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly, leading to loss of control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The cruise control system fails to disengage
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly while using cruise control
the vehicle fails to respond to cruise control inputs.
